title: Next Champions Who Will Get a Visual Upgrade
body: Hello Summoners, today I'm going to talk a little about the visual upgrade and who are on the list to get a visual upgrade. for people who don't what is a visual upgrade its a scale of rework covers changes to a champion's model and artwork. This will often include a more up-to-date voice-over and lore, and may include bug-fixes and minor balance changes - but will not change the champion's core theme. now I'm going to tell who are the next champions who will get a visual upgrade; {{champion:12}}, {{champion:31}}, {{champion:28}}, {{champion:30}}, {{champion:38}}, {{champion:20}}, {{champion:13}}, {{champion:27}} & {{champion:44}}...the models that are already finished is {{champion:30}} & {{champion:13}}...so yeah i hope u guys have a nice day and we all shall be expecting these visual upgrade, keep up the good work riot.

replies.body:
Karthus is indeed done, but no work has been done on Ryze. I'm not sure where you got that idea.

Your list is all over the places. Some of them are things we really want to do soon, some are way farther out, and some of the biggest ones we're working on (like Sion and Warwick) are missing completely.

Basically, the only thing we can 100% commit to at the moment is that you'll see a Karthus VU soonish [tm].

> Karthus is indeed done, but no work has been done on Ryze. I'm not sure where you got that idea.
>

Q: Is Ryze getting any visual work?
A: Grumpy Monkey noted yep and that a model is actually already done.
